title: Round Big Watch Face for Wear
summary: Round Big Watch Face for Android Wear is an easy to read digital watch face.
description: Round Big Watch for Android Wear is an easy to read digital watch face.Features:* native watch face* easy to read* support 12h and 24 h mode* turn on / off leading hour zero* show watch battery status* ambient mode support (display always on)* works even without a bluetooth connection on your WearRound Big Watch is a standalone watch face and can be set as the default watch on your Wear.Round Big Watch for Android Wear is not compatible with Samsung Gear or Sony Smart Watch!** INSTALLATION **After the app is installed on your phone, the watch face will be transferred to your wear watch automatically. This may take a few seconds. If this does not happen, start 'Android Wear' app on your phone and run 'Resync apps' from settings. Choose the Round Big Watch icon in the Android Wear App. This way Round Big Watch will be set as active watch face.** Show or hide the leading zero **If your screen is dim, touch the screen to wake up the watch.Touch and hold anywhere on the background of the screen for two seconds. You’ll see a list of watch faces. Tap the small gear under „Round Big Watch“ to enter the settings.** Change 24h mode **The time format can be changed via your phone time settings.Please contact us if you run into any troubles.
descriptionHTML:
Round Big Watch for Android Wear is an easy to read digital watch face.



Features:
* native watch face
* easy to read
* support 12h and 24 h mode
* turn on / off leading hour zero
* show watch battery status
* ambient mode support (display always on)
* works even without a bluetooth connection on your Wear

Round Big Watch is a standalone watch face and can be set as the default watch on your Wear.

Round Big Watch for Android Wear is not compatible with Samsung Gear or Sony Smart Watch!

** INSTALLATION **
After the app is installed on your phone, the watch face will be transferred to your wear watch automatically. This may take a few seconds. If this does not happen, start 'Android Wear' app on your phone and run 'Resync apps' from settings.
Choose the Round Big Watch icon in the Android Wear App. This way Round Big Watch will be set as active watch face.

** Show or hide the leading zero **
If your screen is dim, touch the screen to wake up the watch.
Touch and hold anywhere on the background of the screen for two seconds. You’ll see a list of watch faces. Tap the small gear under „Round Big Watch“ to enter the settings.

** Change 24h mode **
The time format can be changed via your phone time settings.

Please contact us if you run into any troubles.
comments: Great simple watch face! *Suggestion change colors like the square version of this watch face and be able to change the center to other things like temperature, or steps*
Dude one of the best ambient display screens I ever use, please add the features to remove battery indicator and be able to change tickness of the Numbers
Excellent abstract design. I like it very much on my moto360 1st Gen. Thank you
Looks great. I wish it would have colors options

It installs on my phone just fine but I can't find it within my watch's Wear 2.0 Play Store and it doesn't show up as an on-watch notification to install it on my ZenWatch 3. This app apparently hasn't been updated to be compatible with Wear 2.0.
